about_the_game:
Relicbound is a thrilling third-person shooter and story-driven action-adventure game. Step into the shoes of Jackson, a skilled archaeologist kidnapped by a sinister organization bent on discovering an ancient relic capable of controlling time itself. Driven by high stakes, Jackson must navigate a dangerous journey through dense jungles, intricate cave systems, and awe-inspiring ancient temple ruins, as well as enemy-infested outposts.

With a dynamic weather system and powered by Unreal Engine 5's cutting-edge Lumen lighting, Relicbound offers stunningly lifelike environments that captivate and immerse you in its world. Every moment is crafted with meticulous detail to bring the story to life. Discover the secrets of the past and face off against relentless foes in an epic adventure where every choice could change the course of time.

Prepare to be captivated by the mystery, action, and breathtaking visuals of Relicbound.

KEY FEATURES

  • Thrilling Story-Driven Adventure
    Embark on an epic journey as Jackson, a skilled archaeologist, racing against a sinister organization named Eclipse to uncover an ancient relic with the power to control time.

  • Gameplay Mechanics
    Enjoy engaging gameplay mechanics, including seamless ledge climbing, exhilarating rope swings, and fluid parkour, allowing for dynamic and strategic traversal across diverse and challenging environments.

  • High-Octane Third-Person Shooter Gameplay
    Engage in intense combat with dynamic enemy AI, utilizing a variety of weapons and tactics as you infiltrate enemy outposts and survive relentless foes.

  • Dynamic Weather System
    Experience ever-changing environments with realistic weather effects that enhance immersion.

  • Time-Bending Mechanics
    Harness the power of the ancient relic to manipulate time, solving intricate puzzles and gaining a tactical edge in combat in late game.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore.
